reviewText: I have to write a review for this just because it was so moving... The complimentary atmopshere produced by Sting's voice accompanying Dowland's lyrics, engage all your senses to traverse a beautiful tapestry from beginning to end... The commentary, as well, sparks, not only interest in Dowland himself, but also in Sting's approach to the project, and his passion for the written word... And the depth with which the intent is taken, is simply poignant in describing who Dowland was, and, in turn, who he wasn't... Anyone who has a heart for music needs to see, and hear, this masterpiece...
